mapper.insert: insert into volunteer_task (volunteer_task_id, create_time, create_user_id, title, content, start_time, pid, status) values (#{volunteerTaskId}, #{createTime}, #{createUserId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{startTime}, #{pid}, #{status})
mapper.select: select volunteer_task.ids, volunteer_task_id, volunteer_task.create_time, create_user_id, name as create_user_name, title, content, start_time, pid, views, applies, volunteer_task.status from volunteer_task left join user_info create_user on create_user_id=user_id where volunteer_task_id=#{volunteerTaskId}
